snippet: To smooth the often bumpy winter air travel season, travelers are eyeing everything from expedited screening to apps.
abstract: Air travelers are hoping Transportation Security Administration's new PreCheck airport security system will ease long lines; some are using mobile apps.
lead_paragraph: To smooth the often bumpy winter air travel season, travelers are eyeing everything from expedited screening to apps.

headline.print_headline: Electronic Wrinkles That Speed Up Airport Time
headline.main: Looking for an Edge During Holiday Travel
